description: Un simple monde vide, que Reeborg peut explorer Ã  sa guise.
editor:
# Ensure example works for all languages
from reeborg_en import *
    

detectable = { "name": "one",
        "url": "http://reeborg.ca/src/images/1.png",
        "detectable": True,
        "message": "Allowed to step on 1.",
        "info": "safe"
        }
detectable_fatal = { "name": "two",
        "url": "http://reeborg.ca/src/images/2.png",
        "detectable": True,
        "fatal": True,
        "message": "Not allowed to step on 2."
         }
fatal = { "name": "three",
        "url": "http://reeborg.ca/src/images/3.png",
        "fatal": True,
        "message": "Not allowed to step on 3."
        }


RUR.add_new_thing(detectable)
RUR.add_new_thing(detectable_fatal)
RUR.add_new_thing(fatal)

RUR.add_background_tile("one", 4, 1)
RUR.add_background_tile("two", 7, 1)
RUR.add_background_tile("three", 6, 4)


RUR.add_background_tile("red", 1, 8)
RUR.add_background_tile("#00ff00", 3, 8)
RUR.add_background_tile("rgb(0, 0, 0)", 5, 8)
RUR.add_background_tile("rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)", 7, 8)


while front_is_clear():
    move()

turn_left()

while front_is_clear():
    move()
